item.title: Contact Us
item.description: The Lasseigne Lab is in the Cell, Developmental and Integrative Biology Department at The University of Alabama at Birmingham School of Medicine. Our lab is located on the 9th floor of Tinsley Harrison Tower in 960. Contact PI Dr. Brittany Lasseigne at bnp0001@uab.edu
